an4.180:2.5.pli: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
an4.180:2.5.en: You should neither approve nor dismiss that mendicant’s statement.
